about_the_game:
Story

The Storm is said to be the most dangerous natural disaster, but it can be detected in advance, and all residents of the affected area should evacuate in advance!
You play as Ho Chang, a car mechanic who has quit his job and happens to live in the town of Miman, where the Storm is about to hit, but Ho Chang is oblivious to the extent of the Storm's danger.
With no intention of evacuating, he will fight off the uninvited guests that will arrive with the storm with his bare hands, but will he be able to do it...?

Endless

I don't know what time it was, Ho Chang came to the supermarket to purchase daily necessities, however it was such an unfortunate coincidence that
The attack of the bandits, a resident also coincidentally trapped in the supermarket will also be repelled together with these bandits!

Game Features

  • Simple operation to complete all the action
  • Your enemies seem to be acting in an organized manner, it's easier to survive by attacking according to patterns
  • Your enemies may get angry, or sadly blame you when they are attacked, or when a companion is knocked down by you
  • To achieve a higher record in Endless Mode, you should protect your companions
  • The atmosphere of the scenarios will become different depending on the progress of the game
